subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Ekaterina Makarova, who took a 3-0 lead in nine minutes against Simona Halep, will play in her second straight major semifinal, against Maria Sharapova.
snippet: Ekaterina Makarova, who took a 3-0 lead in nine minutes against Simona Halep, will play in her second straight major semifinal, against Maria Sharapova.
